resources.string: Sorry! This device does not support Rotation Vector Sensor.
Couldn\'t launch wallpaper chooser. You can still activate App Parallax by choosing \"Live Wallpapers\" in your home screen wallpaper picker.

This App can produce a parallax effect by slightly offsetting the position of the wallpaper.
*It is required to obtain the device\'s rotation angle data from Rotation Vector Sensor in real time. You can check whether your device supports the sensor by rotating the device and seeing whether the cube below changes its perspective.
Thank you for using this app, please support us by giving a review or sharing the app.
Before using the effect, please select a set wallpaper
Download best parallax wallpaper on Playstore
Silahkan lakukan enkripsi ulang di website aliendroid dengan AplicationID yang benar.
